document.full_text: sudan's northern army vowed to hold territory it seized in the disputed oil-producing region of abyei, defying a u.n. demand it withdraw and pushing the north and south closer to conflict as the south prepares to secede.
document.title: north sudan defies u.n., vows to stay in abyei
lines_and_colors: sudan's northern army vowed to hold territory it seized in the disputed oil-producing region of abyei, defying a u.n. demand it withdraw and pushing the north and south closer to conflict as the south prepares to secede.
